title: Stephen A. Smith claps back, calls Drake Maye a ‘liar’ over Cam Newton comments
author: Khari A. Thompson
bullets: New England Patriots "Don't tell me that you're an athlete and you don't know that Cam Newton is on this show.
You're lying.
" Drake Maye speaks to reporters after a game against the Atlanta Falcons, Sunday, Nov.

title: More than 400 trans flags removed from Boston Common; advocates call for hate crime investigation
author: Ross Cristantiello
bullets: Local News “It’s discouraging that we can’t celebrate our dead, and especially this week,” an organizer who helped place the flags said.
“It’s heartbreaking to see that here.
” A transgender flag flies next to the Massachusetts state flag in front of Boston City Hall in 2016.

title: Traveling with a group? A lodge in Vermont and seaside cottages in Maine stand out, according to Good Housekeeping
author: Kristi Palma
bullets: Travel They were recognized in the Good Housekeeping 2026 Travel Awards.
The Dunes on the Waterfront in Ogunquit, Maine.

The Dunes on the Waterfront By Kristi Palma November 20, 2025 | 2:14 PM 1 minute to read Those eyeing group travel in 2026 can book two outstanding getaways in New England, one on the beach and one in the mountains, according to Good Housekeeping.

title: Thanksgiving 2025 in Greater Boston: What’s open for dine-in and takeout

title: Why is the delivery fee so high on electric and gas bills?
author: Beth Treffeisen
bullets: Local News Utilities say, simply put, the cost of everything from building materials to maintaining the infrastructure to labor has gone up.
An electricity meter.

title: Review: Ariana Grande and Cynthia Erivo shine, but ‘Wicked: For Good’ can’t escape its original sin

title: Review & setlist: Young fans lit up for Katseye at MGM Music Hall

bullets: Concert Reviews Wednesday's performance from the "Dream Academy" winners was short, sweet, and choreography-heavy.
Katseye performs during the Nickelodeon Kids' Choice Awards this past June.
The group brought its tour to MGM Music Hall on Wednesday night.

title: Man found dead in vehicle at N.H. rest stop
author: John Waller
bullets: Local News The man's body was found Wednesday morning.
By John Waller November 20, 2025 | 12:57 PM Less than a minute to read ShareSend this article to your social connections.
A man was found dead in a vehicle Wednesday morning at the I-93 rest area in Hooksett, New Hampshire, according to State Police.

title: Alleged drunk driver hits pedestrian and flees the scene in N.H., police say
author: John Waller
bullets: Crime The 24-year-old woman is facing multiple charges.

By John Waller November 20, 2025 | 12:38 PM 1 minute to read A 24-year-old woman is facing multiple charges after she allegedly hit a pedestrian in New Hampshire while driving drunk and then fled the scene.
Heaven Martin, of Newbury, is charged with aggravated DUI and felony conduct after an accident following the Tuesday evening incident on Route 103 in Sutton, which is northwest of Concord.
